infos.title: Chieftain of the Blood Altar
infos.characteristics: Stacks [Orc Rage] each time the boss takes DMG. Stacks up to 100 times, which causes Enragement, greatly increasing stats. Heroes that can [Dispel] are advantageous in this stage.

1.name: Vermilion Slash
1.description: Twirls weapon in a circle, dealing P.DMG to nearby enemies. The final hit emits a shockwave, knocking over enemies for 2 sec.

2.name: Blade Frenzy
2.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times and then strikes downwards, dealing P.DMG to nearby enemies and stunning them for 5 sec.

3.name: Blood Strike
3.description: Stomp the ground, stunning nearby enemies for 4 sec. Then, gathering energy, attack enemies with a wide swing to deal massive P.DMG to nearby enemies.

4.name: Orc Rage
4.description: Stacks 1 stack of Orc Rage per every time he takes DMG. Lasts 10 sec and each time ATK and DEF rise by 0.7%. Stacks to a max of 100 times, and upon 100 stacks, gain CC immunity and boosted stats for 7 sec.

5.name: Purify
5.description: Every 30 sec, remove all negative effects and increase ATK SPD.
